duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide one-to-one targeted scientific research guidance for high school students, undergraduates, and graduates.
Design appropriate courses and syllabus according to the background of the students.
Develop and deliver lesson plans that utilize a broad range of appropriate teaching techniques and strategies.

Diagnose and analyze student performance and progress, questions, strengths, concerns, or other relevant concerns of students and provide them with strategic advice on academic research ability development.
Grading and providing feedback on coursework.
Provide a recommendation letter with the personal title after the whole course.

education_certification.credential:
Students or graduates with Top 30 US universities or US Universities' background with Top Professional Ranking
(Must be experienced in Statistics, Cancer, Cell, Biostas, Gene, Bio-medical-related, Psychology)
